name: Valheim Server
longDescription:
A dedicated server for Valheim, a survival exploration game. This server implementation includes automatic backups, updates, and monitoring features.

Key features include:

  • Automatic world backups
  • Server updates
  • Crossplay support
  • Admin list management
  • Server monitoring
  • World persistence
  • Optional public listing
  • Password protection

The server requires approximately 1GB of initial download for server files. UDP ports 2456-2457 need to be accessible for multiplayer functionality.
description: Dedicated server for Valheim with automatic backups and updates
